ShortDesc: Individual resting state parcellation: Xue et al. (2020)
ReferencesAndLinks: Xue, A., Kong, R., Yang, Q., Eldaief, M. C., Angeli, P. A., Dinicola, L. M., â€¦ Yeo, B. T. T. (2021). The detailed organization of the human cerebellum estimated by intrinsic functional connectivity within the individual. https://doi.org/10.1152/jn.00561.2020
LongDesc: Xue et al. (2020) provided two individual parcellations based on resting state data from 31 sessions for each. 10 Cortical networks were estimated using a hierarchical Bayesian model (Kong et al. 2019) and the cerebellum labeled based on the highest correlation with these networks.
